thread.section_title: Sergio Busquets ruins Tiemoue Bakayoko and Antoine Griezmann with roulette during France vs Spain – Metro
thread.title: Sergio Busquets ruins Tiemoue Bakayoko and Antoine Griezmann with roulette during France vs Spain
thread.title_full: Sergio Busquets ruins Tiemoue Bakayoko and Antoine Griezmann with roulette during France vs Spain

author: Tom Olver
title: Sergio Busquets ruins Tiemoue Bakayoko and Antoine Griezmann with roulette during France vs Spain
text:
Sergio Busquets channeled his inner Zinedine Zidane (Picture: ITV) Spain star Sergio Busquets made a fool of Tiemoue Bakayoko and Antoine Griezmann during France’s 2-0 defeat in Paris on Tuesday evening.
Jose Mourinho to start Man Utd's transfer spree by spending £40m on Tottenham star Busquets was impressive throughout and the midfielder’s performance overshadowed that of Chelsea talisman N’Golo Kante in the international friendly at the Stade de France.
One of the moments of the match came after Spain were given a 1-0 lead after David Silva successfully slotted a spot-kick past Hugo Lloris in the 68th minute.
Just moments after the goal, Silva fed Busquets on the halfway line and the Barcelona ace was cornered by France duo Bakayoko and Griezmann.
Kante embarrassed on the international stage pic.twitter.com/iNwlHJOX7L 
— José (@MourinhoMindset) March 28, 2017 
However, the 28-year-old pulled off a Zinedine Zidane special by deceiving the pair with a perfect roulette turn to send Jordi Alba clear down the left flank.
More: Football Jose Mourinho eyeing stunning double deal for TWO Arsenal stars 
N'Golo Kante called 'redundant' as Chelsea star struggles in Spain defeat 
Chelsea target shock deal for second Arsenal star along with Alexis Sanchez 
To make matters worse for France, the attack led to Spain’s second goal of the night following Alba’s textbook one-two with Silva.
Gerard Deulofeu finished off the move from close-range and Julen Lopetegui’s side held on for the win.
MORE: Kylian Mbappe shows he’s perfect for Real Madrid by snubbing Gerard Pique
